story.title: How to Play CheckMate Advance
story.text: Start a run and challenge each of the Boss Pieces to a game of chess.

story.title: The Game
story.text: To win you must score as many points as possible. You'll be rewarded for each victory.

story.title: Offense is the best defense
story.text: Capture your opponents pieces to seriously multiply your score. But don't lose your own!

story.title: The Shop
story.text: Hit the shop to spend your hard earned rewards. And don't forget to have fun out there!
